about.description: I have a degree in Computer Science and work as a Data Analyst and Power BI Consultant, with over 5 years of experience. My goal is to help your company transform data into valuable insights, facilitating strategic decision-making.

services.title: Services
services.description: I build reports with interactive and fully automated dashboards, eliminating the need for spreadsheets so you can focus on what needs to be done!

projects.copy: Some of the projects I have completed throughout my journey as an Analyst and Consultant

skills.copy: Computer Scientist | Data Analyst | Power BI | SQL | Python
